ViewObject.Name: CashLimitLimitVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT investor_accounts.investor_code investor_code, investor_accounts.product_id, product_boid.boid boid, products.product_type product_type, investor_accounts.business_type business_type, investor_accounts.name NAME, investor_financials.purchase_power purchase_power, investor_accounts.is_foreign, investor_accounts.panic_withdraw, broker_mapping.broker_id AS broker_id, broker_mapping.trading_code FROM investor_accounts, investor_financials, product_boid, products, broker_mapping WHERE investor_accounts.account_id = investor_financials.account_id AND investor_accounts.account_id = broker_mapping.account_id(+) AND investor_accounts.account_status = 'ACTIVE' AND investor_accounts.productbo_id = product_boid.id AND investor_accounts.boid IS NULL AND products.product_type <> 'BDA' AND products.product_id = investor_accounts.product_id AND investor_accounts.business_type = 'MBANK' UNION SELECT investor_accounts.investor_code investor_code, investor_accounts.product_id, investor_accounts.boid boid, products.product_type product_type, investor_accounts.business_type business_type, investor_accounts.name NAME, investor_financials.purchase_power purchase_power, investor_accounts.is_foreign, investor_accounts.panic_withdraw, broker_mapping.broker_id AS broker_id, broker_mapping.trading_code FROM investor_accounts, investor_financials, products, broker_mapping WHERE investor_accounts.account_id = investor_financials.account_id AND investor_accounts.account_id = broker_mapping.account_id(+) AND investor_accounts.account_status = 'ACTIVE' AND investor_accounts.boid IS NOT NULL AND products.product_type <> 'BDA' AND products.product_id = investor_accounts.product_id AND investor_accounts.business_type = 'MBANK' UNION SELECT investor_accounts.investor_code investor_code, investor_accounts.product_id, investor_accounts.boid boid, products.product_type product_type, investor_accounts.business_type business_type, investor_accounts.name NAME, investor_financials.purchase_power purchase_power, investor_accounts.is_foreign, investor_accounts.panic_withdraw, NULL AS broker_id, investor_accounts.investor_code AS trading_code FROM investor_accounts, investor_financials, products WHERE investor_accounts.account_id = investor_financials.account_id AND investor_accounts.account_status = 'ACTIVE' AND investor_accounts.business_type = 'BROKER' AND investor_accounts.product_id = products.product_id
UNION ALL
SELECT ins.trade_code AS investor_code, ins.product_id, ins.boid AS boid, 'BDA' AS product_type, ins.business_type, ins.product_name AS NAME, pkg_investor.get_bda_pur_power(ins.boid, ins.broker_id, ins.product_id) AS purchase_power, ins.is_foreign AS is_foreign, ins.panic_withdraw AS panic_withdraw, ins.broker_id AS broker_id, ins.trade_code AS trading_code FROM (SELECT investor_accounts.investor_code investor_code, products.product_name, products.trade_code trade_code, products.product_id, product_boid.boid boid, investor_accounts.business_type business_type, investor_accounts.name NAME, investor_financials.purchase_power purchase_power, investor_accounts.is_foreign, investor_accounts.panic_withdraw, broker_mapping.broker_id AS broker_id, broker_mapping.trading_code FROM investor_accounts, investor_financials, products, product_boid, broker_mapping WHERE investor_accounts.account_id = investor_financials.account_id AND investor_accounts.account_id = broker_mapping.account_id(+) AND investor_accounts.account_status = 'ACTIVE' AND products.product_type = 'BDA' AND products.product_id = investor_accounts.product_id AND products.product_id = product_boid.product_id AND investor_accounts.business_type = 'MBANK') ins GROUP BY ins.trade_code, ins.boid, ins.product_name, ins.business_type, ins.is_foreign, ins.panic_withdraw, ins.broker_id, ins.product_id) t
